name: 林祐正
objective: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
schedule:
Project Management - Introduction
Construction Project Management Concept
Scheduling Management (MS Project and P6)
Web-based System for Construction Management
Programming in Project Management (Using VBA in Excel)
The Application of Database in Construction Management
The Applications of BIM Technology in Construction Management
Real world Application of Computer in Construction Management
scorePolicy:
1. 平常成績 10%
2. 期中報告 30%
3. 期末報告 30%
4. 作業及案例研究 30%
materials:
參考書目:
1. Computer-Based Construction Project Management by Tarek Hegazy (Prentice Hall (2001)
